title: The relationship between lactate dehydrogenase to albumin ratio and all-cause mortality during ICU stays in patients with sepsis: A retrospective cohort study with propensity score matching
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Xiaoyue Guan, Lei Zhong, Jinyu Zhang, Jianhong Lu, Meng Yuan, Lili Ye, Jie Min
